EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_TorontoOfficeOpening_Q314.Reminder to non-registrants - Sept. 25
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - Register to attend Pivotal's Toronto Office Grand Opening (Oct. 2)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register for Pivotal Toronto Office Grand Opening Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
A friendly reminder to register for Pivotal's Toronto office Grand Opening event on October 2nd.
Join us and industry leaders from across Toronto for this evening of conversation and fun.
Spaces are limited and going fast, so register today to RSVP. <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
CLICK HERE TO CONFIRM YOUR ATTENDANCE. <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
We look forward to hosting you for drinks, hors d'oeuvres and entertainment along with great networking. If you have any questions or would like more information, please reply to this email.
Sincerely, Farhan Thawar VP Engineering Canada, Pivotal Labs EVENT DETAILS PIVOTAL OFFICE 1 Toronto St 11th Floor Toronto, ON Thursday, October 2nd 6pm - 9pm CONFIRM ATTENDANCE <http://play.gopivotal.com/Toronto-Office-Opening.html>
